summary: Command‑line utility that runs inference with a pretrained ThutmoseTaggerModel for inverse text normalization. It reads a raw text file where each line is an example, processes the data in configurable batches, and writes the normalized output to a specified file using a Hydra configuration.
business_intent: Enable rapid deployment of a text‑normalization tagging model on new datasets without requiring labeled data, facilitating integration into speech or text processing pipelines.
